content.detailedDescription: i was playing with friends, summer vacation, "g" points and tells me that the white balls of light are back, i say "lets go see what they are", we walked to the end of [name removed/cms/tg] driveway and one of the lights stops in mid air, as if looking at us, that us stop and look at each other puzzled, suddenly the light swoops to the end of the street and stright to [name removed/cms/tg] and i, almost faster then i could see. the ball was right in front of "g", almost chest high, and i was froze in place, i could still see, but in black and white, all sound gone, and i was falling forward, but not falling. the light slowly moved to me but stayed in front of "g" at the same time, it looked like a tube by the time it was in front of me, 1 foot from my face, like a florecent light it glowed blue and looked like tight flames boiling. suddenly i feel i'm being stretched, starting at my head, now i'm coming apart, from left to right, i'm taken apart in the form of digits, black rectangle digits are taking me apart and i'm flying through what looks a wormhole, i'm pulled clockwise forward into the light. suddenly i can see my neighborhood flinging everwhere, so much information at once that i thought i was hallucinating, i was scared at first, but started controling it and found i was going wherever i look, but not with my eyes, looking with my mind. this vehicle flys instantly to the location you've fixed on and instantly back, i felt i was in both places at once. my erratic flying must have startled the real pilot, as he exclamed,"sheesh", or more like "jeese", i lowered my head slightly, and went from seeing outside with my head to seeing with my eyes again. i'm sitting in a big square chair that looks like stone, the whole place looks like stone and should be hard and uncomfortable, but its not. i look right then to the left and behind and see a guy that looks like the grinch that stole christmas, he's standing at a podium looking at what must have been a monitor, he doesn't notice me at first, when he does, he quickly reached to the upper right of his podium and with bear claw finger nail, pushs a button and im back outide and the ball pulls itself back together, and flys back to his friends. i look at "g" and he's looking at me, he yells at the top of his lungs at me,"awwwwwwww", and runs full bore to his house so i went home, too. *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Outside with friends, ran to see balls of light, pulled inside, flew up to houses and back, heard noise, turned and saw grinch at podium studying monitor.

content.detailedDescription: Air show at scott airforce base 9/12/10. golden knights about to exit plane when i noticed two bright white objects in the nw sky. both static in movement at the time and in same general area with some seperation between the two. tried to show them to my father but he did not see, my mother however did see the second orb. first orb headed off to nw at very high speed. second orb was static for 10 to 15 seconds after the first left the area, then followed the first orb, same heading, very high rate of speed, straight flight path. i have sent a inquery to public affairs at scott airforce base, not that i expect much of a reply.
content.summary: Static orbs in sky as golden knights were about to perform.

content.detailedDescription: Was home and left the house for something . we always park in the rear of the house and back out of the drive. i have done this for 10 years . as my truck was backing up i looked to my right as always to be sure no cars were coming and then look over to my left (west).Only looking for another vehicle a mild silver shine caught my eye. it seemed to be far away at least 1 mile in which case would have made this object quite large. if to guess, maybe 500 feet across. it was smooth no noticeable markings,lights,windows or anything. the shape was like a disk with no raised areas or odd features. the top was the same as the bottom with very slight tapering of the ends . only way i can think to describe it is like two frisbees put together. when i looked that direction at first there was a slight hesitation due to the fact that i saw something but then looked away only for a split second ,realized i had saw something that was not supposed to be there. i then quickly looked back and nothing was there at all . nothing anywhere . i was intrigued slightly confused and within a few seconds started to feel a little nervous. i  didn't know if was just mistaking it for something else or what. but after looking around the area again when i got back home i realized that i did not see a plane or anything i could explain. there was nothing around there that could have reflected sunlight or appeared to have that kind of shape . i truly belive i may have seen something amazing .What it was ,i would love to know !   i do belive strongly in the possibilities of alien tech. as well as the paranormal . we as a people and world in this universe are a pretty minimal speck. one has to believe there is something out there more advanced than us.  god i hope so !
content.summary: backing out of driveway and saw a silver object.

content.detailedDescription:
Firstly,the date was 11/09/2010 [sept] and this sighting was seen at  09.10pm bst in barry,south wales,uk - i was not really a believer up until now,rather more of an agreer,and most of the time just to shut my partner up,lol,i'm a bit skeptical but open minded at the same time,and i have no reason to lie, unfortunately i didn't have my phone with me during this sighting so i have no evidence,which obviously doesn't really help to prove this, but regardless of evidence i know what i saw and it wasn't the usual aircraft,my partner suggested i should report it,i agreed and thought others may have seen the same thing and be able to relate,so here it is!.....

so.....

i was walking back from the shop,the time was 09.10pm,and as i was walking up the road that's close to my street,[holton road in barry] i turned the corner to enter my street and noticed lights moving in the sky,there were four of them?,and they were solid and bright white, and all but one were in a line,one of them,the third one was slightly lower than the rest?,they were flying quite high but not that high,it was like looking at four jupiter's,they were quite big but silent!
at first glanse i thought they must be a plane or something but as i carried on walking and then looked up again,the white lights seemed to have changed into one bright orange ball of light which was slightly bigger than all the white ones put together,which were now missing,it then changed direction and flew over the houses close to my street and went out of sight,it to was silent!!!

once i got home,which was about 20 meters away,i went straight to the garden to see if i could catch another glimpse,but by that time there was nothing!

due to lack of evidence i don't expect anyone to believe this,and i know it sounds a bit crazy, but again, i thought i should report and share it since someone else may have seen the same thing?
content.summary: Four white lights changed into one orange ball of light in barry, s.Wales, uk.

content.detailedDescription:
It was exactly 1:50pm when i was on my way to the motomart gas station on bluff road (157) in collinsville, ill. i was traveling east on horseshoe lake road when a bright silvery flashing caught my eye. there was no clouds and a bright blue sky with little wind. i looked up and saw the object and noticed that it was shinning brighter than any star would in the night sky. the object was stationary and not moving, but it was also flashing brighter than any strobe light would be on a plane, every half a second a bright white flash would appear. the object was above the bluff that runs along bluff road (157) when i got to the intersection of bluff rd and horseshoe lake rd i pulled over and watched the object for about 8 min. there was another truck pulled over across the street observing the object. after 8 min i quickly went to the gas station to buy the things i needed, before i entered i could still see the object. when i left the motomart store it was gone. 

please contact me if anyone else reported this object.

thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]
collinsville, ill
content.summary: Ufo shiny sphere about 1500-2000 feet high.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on woodbury rd. heading towards the laughlin bridge which goes over the colorado river leading into bullhead city, arizona. i noticed the ufo heading west towards me on the right side of the road. i could not identify it as anything with which i was familiar suhc as a low flying plane or helicopter.It was very clear outside and the ufo was very close to my vehicle. it was a cigar shaped craft, all dark gray.I estimate it was approx. 40-50 ft. off to my left and no more than 50 feet off the ground. it appeared to be about 40 feet in length and no windows were visible that i could see. it was totally silent and no visible sign of a jet or smoke trail. after passing my car, i looked in my side view mirror as well as my rear view mirror. the craft had completely vanished and was no longer visible. i has my video camera in my car, but as i said, by the time i stopped to look, it was gone. i have had other ufo sightings in the past but nothing quite this close or as clearly visible as this one was. i have to say this sighting did not disturb me in any way, as i do believe that the universe is teaming with other life forms, many probably human like and i am not afraid at all.
content.summary: Extremely close-up sighting while driving. very clear view.

content.detailedDescription:
I  was just sitting at my computer and have a window open infront of me, and i looked up and saw 2 black spheres a little bigger then average balloon size i would say, but they were perfect spheres, and they were flying slow keeping the same altitude, spinning around each other. i didn't see any connection between them. they just flew by and disappeared behind the tree.

p.S: the picture i took is from behind the window, so ignore all the little spots on the picture other then the highlighted area.
content.summary: 2 dark grey balls slowly flew outside my window, spinning around each other.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home around 10pm on farmington road in beaverton my wife and kid and i were driving in the car when i noticed what at first i thought was a very low flying airplane until i noticed there was no blinking lights on it and it was sitting stationary over the road. i pointed it out to my wife. it was right in front of me so i was able to watch it while i was driving. 

the first thing i noticed was how bright it was, it was bright white. it swooped straight up in the air then the light would dim, the whole thing would dim out so all i could see was the dark outline of the craft lightly illuminated. then it would get bright again and move straight up then sideways. my wife was watching it at one point and said "oh my god i think its going to crash its coming right at us" at that point i was busy trying to keep my eyes on the road because there was alot of traffic so i didnt see what it did at that point. when i looked up i saw it dim again then take off at a pretty fast speed towards the hills. we then lost sight of it. 

there was no way it was a plane, it was such a close sighting if it was a helicopter with a search light i would have heard it and like i said i saw it close up and from multiple positions there were no blinking lights at all on it. i guess what impressed us both the most was how it flew through the air going straight up and straight down and sideways and the way it went from completely bright white to no light within seconds. i wish it would have been during the day at that range i would have been able to see the craft that was a close sighting. i asked my wife later that night what she meant by "its coming right at us" and she said it swooped down and was coming right for us at one point then swooped back up into the air.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright object hovers, then makes quick manuevers towards the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
Black or dark brown drone like, could not tell shape, but had sharp angles, looked like morphing for a moment. very slow turning aruond as i flew and turned direction like a rotisserie. around or close to 7 pm
 
after observing for about 3 minutes a second light cigar shaped, very luminous appeared behind. i snapped several photos with my phone but only one shows both. the dark one seems not to have registered in the other photos. witnesses by two (2) people. would like to know if there are any similar reports. they both were silent and did not appear to be any known conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Ufos over south nashville skies.

content.detailedDescription: It was around august 7th 2010, here in algeria, i am a canadian and recently married to an algerian, and this month has been the month of ramadan so we are up all night, have coffee from 3-4am and then sleep most of the day. our house is set high in the mountains overlooking the mediteranean sea. ramadan just ended september 10th, and during this period up until yesterday i, my husband and my sister-in-law are seeing something unexplainable appearing  sporatically but the first time around 3:21 am.  my husband and i were just looking at the sky, and talking, and my husband first noticed it, and said "see there is something there", and i looked to the west and saw this big white light, and it pulsed on and off, it appeared to be moving but floating like, it turned on a consistent white light, moved, then it turned off so it was completely unseen, and then it appeared again, in a different spot, doing the same thing, about 10 times, in the same area of the sky, with no other lights, no color, no sound, it was bigger then a star, and then it just stopped and disappeared, like as soon as it noticed we were watching it or something, and then it did not reappear that night.  we outruled a plane, as i say, its not moving in a straight flying pattern, its eratic, and satellites apparently do not turn on and off like a light bulb.  so the next night i watched and it appeared around 2 am, (again satellites apparently can't be seen at that time) directly in front of my door, far left sw of the little dipper, doing the same thing, and i watched it disappear and 5 minutes later it was back, in a different spot, the same size and brightness, no identifiable anything, other then being a circle of white light.  it continued to do this off and on til after 4am, and i called my husband to see it, but as soon as he got to the door, it would stop.  i didn't see it again for 4 days, and then again around 3 am i saw it, again my husband came to see and it stopped and just disappeared in a clear sky, it only flashed about 3 times.  we both agreed we don't know what it is, and my sister in law came over and spent the night with me from the 6th of september on because my husband works in the sahara, and on the 9th of september, again around 2 am, i saw it, in the same vacinity of the sky, turn on and off once, no strobing light at all, i called my sister to look, and it appeared closer, and did the same thing, flashed twice on and off very slowly, with seconds in between, the flashes  are slow and  then next thing it just is gone right before our eyes. a few nights later i saw it again, around 3 am, it flashed twice in different spots and when i called my sister, she came and it was gone.  last night september llth, 2010, it was 8:30 pm, the first time i have seen it that early, it did the same thing, in the same area, it turned on, and then its on for a few seconds, then it turned off, far left w to the little dipper, i called my sister to see, and she saw it with me, turn on once, in a different spot se, diagonal from where it was, and then just vanish, again in a clear sky, all of these sightings.  if it was a plane surely you watch it leave, planes have colored strobing flashing lights consistently, and makes a noise, and once they leave they don't just appear back, like appear, go, then come back bright as if it never left?  this thing just turns on with consistent white light, and turns off with consistent darkness, one minute its moving the next it is in the same spot, the next it is gone, and the next it is back bright and in a different part of the sky within the same vicinity, disappearing at different times.  i have not been able to photgraph it, its too far away for my phone to pick it up, but other people have seen it,  though no one knows what it is.  i am sure i will see it at some point again tonight, and frankly i wonder why me and what is this friggin' thing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Unidentified flying object.

content.detailedDescription:
We were behind a local restraunt talking to an employee in the ally when we seen the ufo.  the night was very clear, not a cloud in the sky.  the stars were bright.  they orange color appeard and i noticed it first.  i watched for a flash or any different color to see if it was a plane.  but there was none.  only a orange ball(from the distance) i'd say it could of only been a few miles from us.  not that far away.

four orange lights moving north about as half as high as a normal commercial jet flies.  two of the objects were close together, id say a few hundred of feet apart. moving at a consistant speed them fading all in what it seems like the exact same part of the sky.  and faded into the night with in a few seconds.  soon one more came and did the same, and as soon as that one disapeardin in the same part of the sky, another came and did the same.  we were on main street and close to the building.  so we couldnt see them south of main street.  it looked like they were on the western part of town or outside of town heading north.  

they glowed an orage color and did not flash, but were bright.  

we all got our phones out to take a picture or make a video.  our phones did not have the quallity to get any good pictures. our friend did, but it was just a faint orange light in the darkness.
content.summary: Orange light moving north. total of 4.

content.detailedDescription: I'm writing this for my wife. i was talking to her on the phone as i left work, and she was driving west in her car to park on a street next to our apartment in the mar vista area.  within 5 minutes of the conversation, she interrupts to tell me she's looking at a strange object in the sky.  it was a very bright turquoise colored sphere she noticed. it was brighter than any other star/planet in the sky, at about the level that planes fly into the santa monica airport, which is very close to us.  it was odd to her, because we are used to seeing planes come and go, and the light configuration was different. instead of the standard red light, blue light and white lights blinking, as found on planes and helicopters, the light was consistent and not blinking.  it seemed to travel upwards as it got smaller, and then traveled very quickly across the sky south eastwards.  there were planes in the area that she could hear, and she was able to compare relative speeds between the sphere and the planes.  it was traveling much quicker than the incoming/outgoing aircraft. there was no discernible shape associated with the light, it was just a sphere.  she then watched it travel south east until she couldn't see it anymore. it started out the size of the light of saturn as it has been very prominent on the western horizon recently, and within a couple of minutes, she described it as looking like a 'pinhole' in the sky.
content.summary: Turquoise sphere appears in west horizon and travels up and south east.

content.detailedDescription:
That night we knew a misfired russian missle was to pass over california. a fear that it would crash onto one of the cities was frightening.  my mother, ever practical, herded us outside. when we asked why, she simply said," if it crashes here, we'll see it, die together." while looking for the missile, we heard the radio tell us step by step where the missle was.  when it was close to us mom had us look towards the north, and sure enough, we were relieved when it passed over.  
   later that night, time unknown, we were still looking up at night sky when someone said look at this. i don't remember who said it. the sky had 3 cigar shaped ufos.  we thought they were blimps at first, but you could tell they had nothing above them.  we moved over to the dark side of our home to get a better look. we had not heard about ufos, so there was no fear, just wonderment.
    the crafts made sharp turns and was quiet, no noise.  the front and back ends were shaped like a helicopter window, but larger. there were windows around the entire crafts. we saw people looking out and moving about the ships.  we could not see any details because all the windows were green. looking at these soundless, right angle moving crafts is all i remember.  we were amazed no one saw them, it was right at the time of packing season, and trains, trucks and even people talking could be heard. the sheds were 2 blocks from our old home. 
   a side note:
  i'm the oldest of four, i was anywhere of ten to thirteen when this happened, my siblings are 4 to 7 years younger than i and remember smaller crafts coming out of the bigger crafts.  i do not, neither does my mom.
   we did not forget the incident the following day, in fact it's all we talked about. we never felt fear, we just want to know is why were they there. many sightings over the years have proven that mendota, ca. is ufo popular. i say this because we had a teacher who had worked at nasa, told us the hills, close by were a perfect place for a secret base.  many unexplained sightings have been said to fly towards those same hills.

the question is, why would ufos be interested in a missile that could possibly hurt many people.
content.summary: We observed 3 ufos the night a russian misfired missile passed over mendota, ca, my home town.

content.detailedDescription: Outside on my porch on 09/11/10 at 925 pm, zip 02324. looking up about 30 degrees above horizon south, south south west saw object in sky that appeared to be a plane in the distance. object was traveling north, northeast at a steady rate when it suddenly cut 90 degrees "down" towards the ground, then again turned at a sharp 45 degrees to return north, northeast. it then disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Object in sky makes massive sharp angle turns.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving home from a movie and it was almost midnight. we were very alert from all the caffeine in the diet cokes. there was no traffic; everything was very dark and quiet as i was looked up at a black sky with few stars. one very bright star could be seen in the upper right corner of the windshield. i pointed it out to my husband suggesting that maybe it was the north star, which i had heard could be the brightest in the sky. as we both glanced at the star it moved in a horizonal blur to the left upper corner of the windshield on my husband's side, then stopped abruptly and hovered perfectly still for maybe 5 seconds. we were too shocked at the sudden movement to say anything. after 5 seconds it moved to the center on the identical horizonal plane in the sky, stopped suddenly without slowing and continued to hover perfectly still for another 5 seconds. then it flew straight up until it was out of sight. due to the speed, this "star's" movements took less than a second for each direction - left, right, and then straight up.
  
my husband and i didn't speak for about 2 miles. to break the silence i asked, "did you see that?" he replied, "yep." i said, "did that move like a jet or heliocopter to you?" he replied, "nope." i followed with my last question - "do you think we saw a ufo?" he says, "yep," and we finished the ride in silence.

the object was so far away that it truly looked like a white star. it moved from one side of the sky, as seen through our windshield, to the other side in less than one second. it stopped suddenly without slowing. the best way to describe it is that it moved like a hockey puck in a ice hockey game. the perception of speed was the same, as well as the sudden stops and direction changes. the directional changes were perfect angles, no curves, and all happened that fast. 

can a living thing be flying a craft that stops as if it hit a brick wall? mmm... can a drone craft do that? has our government the capability of building a craft that not only hovers, but goes forward, backward, and upward without turning or tilting? jets have to make wide circles and heliocopters can't fly backwards. this craft was truly omnidirectional. either our government is really very far ahead of public technology or it wasn't man-made. it certainly wasn't natural either.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: At first i thought it was the brightest star in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Between 12:00 and 12:15 am sept. 11, 2010 i was out walking my dog in the yard when i saw this bright blue/white burning light as high up in the sky as i could see. it was falling at an incredible speed over kahului and seemingly landed towards iao needle north of the airport. it seemed like it crashed into the earth but there was no noise. the second it hit there was a rolling blackout for about 15 seconds. we live at the top of haleakala and have strange sightings pretty much everyday. 3 nights ago on sept 8th at 1:00 am exactly there were 3 discs floating above the gulch directly across from our house. we are the only ones with a view of this area. they had a band of streaming orange lights left to right scanning movement- over the cattle feilds. we watched them there for about half an hour. it looked like a jellyfish- a disc with lights hanging from below. after watching  for about 30 minutes, we tried to take pictures but the phone and camera batteries were all dead, and when we came inside all our clocks read different times.  on sept 7th we were driving down old haleakala hwy around 5 pm there is always alot of air traffic over kahului, with the airport right there; however, we spotted an unidentified floating object straight over the town of wailuku. it was disc shaped and silver, the sun was reflecting off of it very brightly. it was a little bigger than an airplane but just sitting in one place, that is how it caught my attention. i began to look closer and it began moving to the south at a very slow speed this is when i realized that it was definately no aircraft that i have ever seen. then it definately had my attention. it moved back and forth north to south from iao needle over to iao valley 3 times it came back to rest over wailuku floating there for about another 30 seconds then at incredible speeds it looked like it fell from the sky, hit the ground then shot back up and into iao valley like lightning. it was the creepiest thing that i have ever seen. i was shaken by that experience deeply, but since then the sightings have only gotten more numerous. 

another extremely strange experience that has shaken me recently actually occured twice. the first occuring on august 23 at 6:00 am driving from kihei to makawao hawaii, i noticed a strange orange/ brown cloud, like a funnel but it wasn't kicking up dirt outside of the funnel. it was just like a tube of smoke coming up from the ground, my first thought was that there was a plane crash, or maybe a fire in the cane fields, but it wasn't moving like normal smoke it was moving in a counter clockwise direction eerily slow. as i got closer i noticed a few unusual police vehicles surrounding the scene. there were men scoping it with binoculars. there was a strange smell coming from the cloud. it definately didn't smell like sugar cane burning.  i snapped a few photos with my phone out the window of the car. when i got home and examined the photos  i noticed a red orb floating in the cloud i zoomed in and noticed it was a perfect hexagon shape, red but emitting a silver glow from behind. the shape is very distinct! i had a similar experience with the exact same kind of cloud yesterday sept. 10 at 6:00 am again near the same spot, towards paia town. the first picture is from aug. 23. taken straight from my blackberry phone i haven't touched the pictures at all. the second picture was from sept 2nd we were just driving taking pictures of the scenery trying to get the light coming through the clouds, we didn't see anything at the time but later noticed another flying object in that picture as well. i'm not sure what is going on here, but it is definately something.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A bright blue/ white light- very large fell to the earth at incredible speed as soon as it hit the power went out.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room doing a couple of chores and my father was outside standing in the driveway looking around in his binoculars and he noticed something had moved close to the moon which was very bright and triangle like so he came back in and told me so i went to check it out which it was true a triangle like object was extremely close to the moon, id say by looking at it almost touching the moon. at first we thought it was a really bright star that was just a coincidence to be near the moon but then it started to look like it was kinda moving back and forth but you barely see it like vibrating. the motion was quite dead still. my feelings on this are unsure and i dont know what to say about this and if its something then im glad ive seen something but if its just nothing then its fine no harm done.
content.summary: Triangle object floating near moon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the daytime, 11th september 2010, occultation of  venus by the moon from durban, south africa when the sighting occurred. it was overcast all morning and there was cloud when the occultation started at 14h43 local time. by 15h57 when venus reappeared the moon and venus were clearly visible through my 8x32 binoculars.  while scanning for the crescent moon i saw just slightly east of the moon a luminescent green, triangular object with bright star-like lights at each corner, almost directly overhead. it was somewhat smaller than the moon. the object then slowly moved off in a southerly direction and disappeared after two or three minutes when i tried to view it with the naked eye. i couldn't see it without the binoculars. 

the distinctive green first caught my attention and distracted me from the moon.  my initial thought was that it was a microlight but on reflection it seemed far too high and i heard no sound. not expecting anything else  i was somewhat surprised at the sighting. after i lost sight of it i felt a little incredulous and yet disappointed that it had gone before i could track it further. unfortunately i was alone at the time so had no one to verify it for me.
content.summary: Triangular luminescent green with bright white lights at each corner.

content.detailedDescription: I live west of toronto in ontario canada and last night (sept 10 2010) about 8:50 eastern time i saw a light in the sky moving towards the south, it was a circular light with no other lights flashing on it. i thought it must be a personal plane since we have an airfield not to far away. then i realized this light is actually getting smaller and smaller until it completely disappeared. the whole sighting lasted about 10 seconds. the light moved in a straight line. im not sure what the altitude of this object was but i got the impression it was rising.
content.summary: Saw a light moving and it got smaller and smaller until it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I really don't know what i saw but i know it gave me chills! i've never given much credit to eyewitness accounts until i experienced this myself. anyone who's anyone can distinguish an airplane or a helicopter at night...Unless it's military you're going to see red and green lights and a flashing beacon light. living in the west valley of phoenix you can often look towards the scottsdale area and see the bright landing lights of planes on approach to sky harbor. when i first saw this object it occurred to me that this might be what i was looking at. i'm not up on all of the scientific terms to describe the object's initial location so i will do my best using constellations, approximate angles to the ground, and "clock" angles. the following is what i witnessed.

at about 3:15 am, which is about 2.5 hours ago right now, on saturday, september 11, 2010 i stepped outside to have a smoke before going to bed. our back patio faces to the north. we are approximately 2 miles southwest of westgate city center, university of phoenix stadium, and jobing.Com arena. as i usually do when i'm outside at night i look to the sky star gazing and looking for the occasional shooting star. so as i'm turned slightly to the northeast i see a little pinpoint of light appear that was red in color and moving in a southeasterly direction...Towards the airport. to put it in perspective the north star was directly out our back door, roughly 30-35 degrees above the horizon with cassiopeia slightly higher and to the west. the object was probably between 35 & 40 degrees above the horizon and at about the 1 o'clock position relative to the north star. it was moving somewhat slowly but it seemed too far away to be on approach.

approximately a minute after i noticed it the red pinpoint was gone and in its place a slightly larger white light. at this point i'm thinking it must be a plane on approach and it only looked far away because it's a little 2 seat cessna. it didn't take me long to change my mind as only a few seconds later the white light shrunk back to the red pinpoint. the object cycled from red pinpoint to white light several times, i want to say in 10-15 second intervals, as it continued moving in the same direction. now i have no idea what to make of it. i thought there might be a possibility it was a satellite catching sunlight and reflecting it. however, i have witnessed satellites before as well as the shuttle and space station flying over when i lived back in michigan. satellites travel at tremendous speeds and traverse large areas of sky quickly, while this thing still hadn't made it to 3 o'clock position relative to the north star.

again, my mind was changed...About 5 minutes after i first noticed the object it reverted back to a red pinpoint and stopped moving. it just sat there stationary like that for about 2 minutes when all of a sudden it turned to the white light again and continued moving. it went through i want to say 4 red and white cycles when it stopped again. this time it stayed stationary for a minute but it continued with the light cycles. after that minute passed it began to move back towards where i initially saw it! right about at this point i'm thinking that perhaps it was a helicopter due to the starting and stopping as well as the possibility that the white light was a search light. the only thing that didn't make sense about this theory was that there was no beam reflecting on dust particles in the air and the white light was not independent of the entire objects movement...Meaning it didn't appear that it could be positioned to shine backwards, it was fixed and moving as one with the red light. eventually, it stopped moving again and stayed white for almost a full minute. when it turned to the red pinpoint again it continued moving for about 30 seconds, stopped, and then just seemed to fade out and vanish. this vanishing part is what convinced me to write this, i am positive that it was not a satellite or an aircraft that i am aware of! unfortunately, i have no pictures or evidence, only my eyewitness account. if any part of me was skeptical before it's not anymore...I have no clue what i was observing for about 10 minutes!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pinpoint of light resembling a star appeared from nowhere, thought it was an airplane on approach until it stopped moving and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My children and i were watching the meteor shower between 8 and 9 pm mst, then noticed a very distant object that looked like a distant star, it was moving at a steady pace. we watched it for about 10 minutes moving across the sky on a slightly curved path, seemed like a very long distance. before we couldn't see it anymore it seemed to be dimming a little, like it was getting further away. then my son said it had a gold or amber glow around it for a second, that's when we saw it shoot off into the distance and couldn't see it anymore. it was so far away there was no way i could have video taped it (not that i even thought about until after), the sky was clear and filled with stars, it seemed to just blend in, except it was moving. there really isn't much more i can say about it, other than i am happy it kept it's distance.
content.summary: Distant star-like moving across western sky during perseid meteor shower

content.detailedDescription:
Less than a wk. after the night sighting i have just reported (which did not have a witness other than myself, but another tenant in the apartment house i live in saw this one) there appeared out of the cloudless blue sky an object that seemed to be about fifty yards in front of us and about thirty-five ft. up.  i was sitting on the ground level front porch out front.  there was no sound that i could hear from the object.

my estimation at its size could be very wrong, as i think it had a depth or length to it that i could not see beyond the front of it.  it looked to be about twelve feet wide.  it looked like there was silver fire about a foot and a half long shooting out from it all across it.  like i said in the description above, like the 'sparks' of sparklers, only a foot and a half in length, and much much larger generally, and all across what i thought then was the front of it, as the object was moving towards me.  

when i, rarely, see a ufo i try to see what there is about it that could be explainable as something mundane, and i did so with this, thinking, could it be some kinds of lights that i'm seeing, but it was obvious that it was some kind of, not flames, but flame or huge sparkler-like 'flames' coming from it.  it came down at a slight, straight angle in my direction, though still fifty yards or so away, at the most, then it went sharply to its right and up.

i began to go into the apartment house to get my camera, but after a few quick steps i thought, it'll probably be gone by the time i can get my camera, and i saw from my second-story window that it had gone.

my reactions was amazement at such an unusual thing, and too, the 'flames' that were most of what i saw could have been on any side of it, i couldn't tell from which side or if from only one side, as they were towards me, from where i saw it, both when it was moving towards where i was and when it was ascending towards the side of where it had been.  

for a couple of seconds i thought i could see metal, silvery metal above and in back of where the 'flames' were, a foot or two in back of them and less than a foot 'above' the huge, sparkler-like 'flames.'

it seemed very much an object that was there, and i feel sure it was, but there certainly was what seemed like a strangeness to it, probably because i had never seen anything like it.

i think too, the way it appeared fairly near me and descended as it moved a bit closer, that it may have been checking me out, perhaps because of the sighting i had a few days earlier.  i didn't really have a feeling about that, but it was something i was thinking a little later.  in spite of the objects 'unusualness,'  i was much less excited about it, though glad i saw it, than about the earlier sighting, but the guy sitting on the porch with me was very excited, to put it mildly.

excuse the long report.  i guess i could make this report much briefer, but now that i have it, and exactly as it was, i will leave it.
content.summary: A bar of 'lights' in the air  that were like sparklers' silver fire appeared about fifty yards away for about a minute or two.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside for some cool fresh air for a few minutes, as i usually do once or twice in the evening.  i also usually look up at the stars, the moon and any visible planets just to see them.  as soon as i looked up this evening i noticed two stars 'close' together in the west, but the reddish-white one, at a much lower altitude, began moving fairly quickly, but at a steady rate, in my general direction.  it was going much too slow for a satellite and much too fast for a plane.  i could not hear any sound associated with it at any time.

when it got to what i think was about 900-1000 ft. above me, and only about 50 ft. away horizontally, it stopped.  it was there about four seconds when i thought to say, and did say, but not aloud, "please signal me if i am communicating with you."  by "you" i meant any occupants of course.  in a second the 'star' 'morphed' into a light-brown form six times the size of the star shape.  the 'star' was no longer visible. 

the form was perfectly clear and with no lights on it.  perhaps it was lit from inside, though it did not have a transparent look about it.  it was a basically round form, but not exactly spherical, it was longer and wider and round where it seemed to go out from where the 'star' had been, but more pointed at the other end.  the form looked as if it had, or was of some kind of texture, rather than plastic or whatever.  it stayed in that shape for about two seconds at the most, then was the star shape again.  a few seconds later it began to move east again.  

it disappeared a little more than half-way through the eastern part of the sky.  there were some clouds in that part of the sky, though they were barely visible.  it was a fairly dark sky except for the stars in the western part of the sky at that time of night.  the ufo might have gone behind a cloud, though i don't know that.  

when the ufo, for lack of a better name for it, as that is what it was technically and perhaps in the general use of the term, i don't know what else it could have been, but when it responded, if it was responding, to my request to it that it respond to me, i became fairly excited.  it may be 'amateurish' to think and say so, but at the time and even more so later, i did become pretty damn excited about it -- though i didn't quit looking at it or jump up and down when i saw it do as it did.  i did feel good about the fairly certain assumption that it had responded, especially for a couple of days after, and i still think it was neat that it or they appeared to do so.
content.summary: A 'star' crossed the sky and stopped about a thousand ft. up and "signaled " to me when i asked it to.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west on hwy 110 in murray county, ok, the witness noticed a white, late model car on the side of the road ahead of him. he decided to pull over to figure out what had drawn their attention. looking up, the witness noticed a large strange craft at an altitude of about 2,000 ft and climbing straight up. the strange craft was orange in color and as large as a 727 airliner. it was shaped like the 1950s flying wing bomber at the front and had a huge fuselage protruding out the back of the craft that curved up like the back of a canoe only more so. the witness used to be a private pilot and at one time owned his own aircraft but was at a loss as to what he was seeing. at times he referred to this craft as an object at at other times as a plane. he does not want to be ridiculed by anyone and will not share this sighting with any friends.
     as soon as the craft was noticed the witness retrieved his binoculars from his vehicle and got a good clear look at the craft at 15x power. protruding on each side of the craft was a shiny rod exiting the front of the fuselage, running along entire length of the craft and then reattaching at the back of the fuselage at the same angle which may have been 45 degrees vs 90 degrees. these shiny rods were reflecting the sunlight very well. the time was around 7:30 pm on a clear day, the sun was still shinning bright yellow and not yet turning sunset orange. the witness is adamant that the craft was not glowing orange but instead had a surface that was orange. no insignias or markings, or cockpit area was noticed, nor was any sound from the craft of any kind noticed. also visible were two short contrails from the craft that remained a constant length of about 1/3 the length of the craft. the short constant contrails were flat instead of round. 
     the witness watched the craft climb from about 2,000 ft altitude to about 50,000 ft altitude in about 4-5 mins time, after which the craft suddenly shot off to the east vanishing from sight all in a matter of seconds. at first the witness drove to his nearby house to alert his wife so that she may also see the craft but decided it would take her too long to come out of the house, so he returned to the spot at the side of the road and continued watching. the witness stated he had to quickly turn his body to follow the craft when it shot to the east. as was mentioned, the witness had for years been a private pilot and feels his estimates on size and altitudes are accurate. the witness wishes he could speak to the people who had pulled to the side of the road ahead of him, he feels they may know if the craft rose from the ground or approached from the west, etc.
     also: the following day at exactly the same time and spot on the same road as the previous day's sighting, the witness's wife noticed a distant craft in the western sky. she asked her husband to pull to the side of the road and using the same binoculars he had used the day before, observed a disc shaped craft that was glowing orange and climbing at the same time it traveled to the west. no further details from this second sighting are known at this time. both witnesses which to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Noticed car pulled over on side of road so pulled over to figure out what they were looking at. in the sky above was a strange orange colored  craft going straight up from about 2,000' to 50,000' in about 3 mins and then suddenly shooting off to the east.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in sheffield, alabama, and i've been seeing these things for quite awhile, but have only recently come to be alarmed.  every time i ever saw it, i thought it was venus - probably because when it first started to appear, it matched up with venus on my google sky map.  it always appears just very slightly south of the western sky at dusk and travels in an easterly direction.  but don't get me wrong, it goes up and down and backwards and forwards the whole time...Veeeeerrryy slowly.  with no sound that i can hear, yet it has only been close enough to hear once, and then there was no sound either - i know because an airplane passed right before i saw it in the same place, and i heard the airplane loud and clear.  one night i watched it for 30 minutes thinking it was coming toward me, but it ended up fading away, and i assumed it was heading the opposite direction.  later on, i started watching it with the binoculars, and that's when i noticed that it was flashing.  it did not look like anything natural.  after i witnessed the flashing for the first time, i seemed to notice the flashing more often, even without the binoculars.

in the past couple months or so, i had gotten really involved in ufology and such, and they seem to be drawn to me now, which is terrifying, so i don't want anything to do with any of it anymore.  basically, 3 nights ago, i saw one flying by close enough to make out that it wasn't a plane, because a plane flew by right before i saw it.  i actually tried talking to it with my mind, asking it to power up, (believe me, i know how weird it sounds) but to my disbelief, it actually started strobing hard right before it disappeared behind the trees - almost like when a police car flashes its lights.  i went inside and set the alarm, and when i hit the last button, a light behind me in the house flashed and i heard what sounded like a power surge.  my whole body felt like it was electrified, and every hair stood up - this was the first paranormal experience i ever had.  later that night i had one of the realest dreams i've ever had that i was abducted, and when i woke up, i couldn't go back to sleep because i was so terrified.

the next night, i saw it sitting in it's normal location when it first appears, and noticed that it was definitely coming towards me - so much so that i was so terrified of what i might see, i had to get up and go inside because i started having a panic attack and got nauseous.  it was really strange.  later that night i had another dream that i saw like a mothership-like craft, which was also really unsettling, yet not as much so as the abduction dream.  and by the way, all day this day and the day before i heard planes overhead constantly, yet only saw one.

tonight, i watched it sit in its usual location and strobe like crazy.  it came a little closer and then started to drop down behind my neighbor's house and fade out a bit.  later tonight, i went back outside, and it was in a completely different part of the sky, still strobing like crazy - red, blue, green, and white.  this time, i also witnessed 3 tiny separate single strobe flashes in separate intervals, right after one another which seemed to be away from the craft and move in a counter-clockwise l shape going up to the craft - only 3 - flash, flash, flash, gone - but the craft was still there strobing crazily.  i went so far as to ask my neighbor, who witnessed the same thing as well as my best friend who was in a neighboring town who could also see exactly what i was seeing.  neither could explain it.  i also went so far as to call the local police station to report it and ask if anyone else had reported it, but they said no & they would walk outside and look.  i also tried to call the local newspaper, but it was too late and they were closed.

i'm really scared at this point, because i know this is not normal, and i just don't want to see it anymore.  i just feel like it's watching me or something, and i just want to be left alone.  especially the bad dreams are the worst.  if i have another dream tonight, i don't know what i'll do.  i don't like it.  there have been so many cases of this that obviously our government has to know, or either they are just completely retarded.  i just don't like being kept out of the loop, and if there is something that i don't know that i don't even want to know, just please stop flashing it in my effing face every single night.  i'm just tired of feeling like i'm going insane, because this is just getting ridiculous.  please explain to me what i am seeing.  what is the most likely explanation?  is there one?  please get back to me as soon as possible, because i'm not really comfortable with this stuff anymore - i've given up all research on ufology and exopolitics because i just want things to go back to normal, but these things keep appearing every single night.  sometimes i wish the air force would send jets and just shoot it down, but i feel like nobody knows it's even there except for my friend and neighbor who i personally made aware of it.  please help!
content.summary: Flashing strobe-like light (white, red, blue, green), happens every night in western sky.

content.detailedDescription: I looked up at the clear night sky because i noticed movement, when i looked i seen a big star like object moving across the sky, i immediately got excited, and all of a sudden another star like object caused a bright flash or sparkle and disappeared. i looked for the other object and found it again moving at a more brisk pace and it gradually appeared to get smaller and disappear into the blackness of space. i stared up at the sky for a couple minutes after this and i noticed slow moving stars looking like they were moving on an orbit across the sky
content.summary: None submitted. see detailed description.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from a friends house through a field.I was on my way back home to go to bed.When i had seen a violet colored glow in the corner of my eye and decided to look upwards.Sense i live near a-lot of military bases i just assumed it was another black project.But the way it was hovering and the length it hovered i knew it wasn't a black project.I stood in the field transfixed for at-least 1 hour 10 minutes just looking.I felt like it was scanning me or something to that effect.I had some sort of paralysis that made me unnerved like i couldn't move even if i tried.Then after i was able to regain my constitution and be able to move.The violet glow intensified then it was as if it went from stationary to at-least mach-4 if not faster.When i got home it took me at-least a week to finally be able to sleep.To this day i still have nightmares from this event.
content.summary: Craft hovered and zipped away.

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly before 9am on september 7, 2010 one mile offshore north of key west, florida proper i witnessed a dark and indistinct object about four fingers (7-10 degrees) above the eastern horizon.   i was seated inside my boat looking through the windows which wrap 270 degrees around the salon.

a minute or two later i glanced back in the same direction taking note the object had not changed its spacial relationship to a stratus cloud low in the sky in that direction.  wind was calm and the few clouds in the air were moving very slowly.  with regard to the geometry and the hight of stratus clouds and the apparent hight of the cloud and the object above the horizon, this suggested the object was either stationary or drifting in the wind at a similar hight as the stratus cloud in front of which it lied.  it further suggested the object was less than a mile high and less then 10 miles from my location.  it was indistinct further suggesting it was more than 3 miles away and therefore, at an altitude of more than 1,500 feet.

both area airports are located such that airplanes do not normally travel at that altitude and from that direction toward my location.  airplanes coming from the east, fly cross my view. helicopters who remain that high in the sky have few reasons to hover.   the unusually long duration of motionlessness suggested something interesting.  for these reasons, i fetched binoculars and stepped outside.  the object which i had seen from inside the boat and with out binoculars was also visible outside the boat.  the view through the binoculars provided a much more detailed view of the object, consistent with an object more than 5 miles distant, but less then 10. 

the object had a distinct edge, no helicopter blades, and no wings.  the object was slightly ellipsoid, nearly circular and grey in color with a contrasting shade of grey horizontal band one fourth its hight and located above the object's horizontal center.

i continued to observe the object through the binoculars for more than five minutes.  occasionally glancing with out the binoculars.  the object remained unchanged for the whole time of my observation.  it did not move with respect to the clouds which were also not moving with respect to the ground for the period of observation.  the object did not become smaller or larger and its visual definition did not increase nor decrease.

i decided to climb to the fly deck where i could take a seat to continue my observation.  the climb and taking a seat took less than a minute, i then scanned the sky around the stratus cloud which was behind the object.  i could not find the dark object with my unaided eye.  i scanned farther in both directions and higher in the sky and with the binoculars but was unable to identify any unusual object.
content.summary: Observed through binoculars, at a distance of 3 to 8 miles, a distinctly edged ellipsoid with a distinct and dark band.

content.detailedDescription: I just parked my car in my driveway, my family walked into the house.  i was starting to unload the back of my suv and i saw a bright light in the sky.  i first thought it was an airplane since we see them regularly.  pittsburgh international airport is close by.  this was brighter than usual and for as large as it was, there was no sound.  the night was dark and partly overcast.  i watched the object move slowly to the east, toward pittsburgh.  it moved steadily, so i continued to look for flashing lights or other color light but saw only a whitish ball.  it moved similarly to what i remember satellites to look like in the sky, just much, much brighter and it was moderately large in size.  as i watched for about 20 sec or so, the object turned completely red and became pale.  it stayed red for just a few seconds then seemed to taper off and completely disappear.  i watched and listened for another few minutes and saw and heard nothing from the object.  i did see other aircraft circling the airport sky...Three i believe in different points in the sky and at various altitudes.  my last thought was that it was something from the airshow that is in town this weekend, but once again, there was no sound and i'm moderately familiar with both commercial and military aircraft from seeing them often throughout the years.  i am certain it wasn't a meteor, it moved too slow.  i'm not sure what i saw tonight but it sure was interesting.
content.summary: Slow moving, silent, white/yellow ball of light, turns red and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to meet a tenance to collect rent.  it was approx. 4:20 pm - daylight. i was in my car going to head west however when looking to make the right hand  turn i turned and looked left.  i saw what appeared to be a cumulus cloud like appearance moving faster than the other clouds -  which were not moving at all.  i thought it could be a kid toy, but there was no smoke trail.  the cloud, from the ground, appeared to be about 4 ft by 4 ft.  it was all cloud and i saw two lights on the bottom and one light on top of the observation.  it flickered about every 2-3 seconds.  the cloud appeard to almost camoflauge whatever was in the cloud.  i followed it in my car for about two minutes.  i lost track of it.  nobody around me seemed to have had their eye on such a peculiar sight.  i know what i saw and called the local news channel when i got home... i felt crazy calling them.
content.summary: Puffy cloud like appearance moving approx. 3-5 miles p/hour. had lights beneath and above the cloud like appearance.
